prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with striking yellow and black stripes and sharp wings.
Imagine a fierce insect Pokemon that can fly at high speeds and has a stinger.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a bee, complete with wings and a menacing appearance.
Generate a bug Pokemon that has a unique combination of yellow and black colors.
Show me a Pokemon that is known for its agility and ability to quickly attack enemies.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that resides in forest habitats and excels in battles.
Make a small, aggressive Pokemon with a sleek build and powerful stinging abilities.
